pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This is an updated version of the Bible, published by Konstantin Fotinov, Petko Slaveykov and Hristodul Sichan-Nikolov in 1871. This version is made by Veren LTD. All texts are collated with the originals.
This module is part of the CDL Project. CDL Project aims to create an electronic library Bulgarian of biblical texts, commentaries and researches.
